feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.85.1
entry.content:
Quick fix for a missing database field that accidentally didn't get added to production systems.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Add public IDs for users by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3011

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Turn off jemalloc stats by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3012

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.85.0...v0.85.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.86.0
entry.content:
This release adds another long-requested feature, a big download button for an entire model! No, I'm not sure how it took this long either. But, there's not just one download button - there are options! You can download just the supported files, just the unsupported, or just one particular file type!

Note: The downloads are generated on the fly (and cached for 6 hours), so for large models it might take a little while to start downloading; we'll get some UI feedback for that into a future release so you can see what's happening.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Add Download button for entire model, with file subset options by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3020
  • Add opengraph metadata to creator pages by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3014

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Restore missing model page title by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3025
  • Fix model supported/unsupported test by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3026
  • Change to sidekiq-cron for more reliable job scheduling by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3033

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Remove built-in log viewer; use Docker logs instead by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3013
  • Translation updates (DE, ES, PL) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3023
  • Improvements to download UX and cache sweeping by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3034
  • Hide cache clearance jobs from activity list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3035
  • Add proper markup to download links by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3041

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.85.1...v0.86.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.87.0
entry.content:
This release adds the ability to resolve problems in bulk; so if you have a lot of missing files, or empty folders, now you can remove them all in one go! There are also new application and database performance dashboards, so you can see how your instance is performing, as well as the usual collection of bug fixes.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Add application and database performance dashboards by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3043
  • Add fediverse creator opengraph tags by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3047
  • Raise problems for zero-length files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3101
  • Resolve problems in bulk by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3108
  • Add pagination for bulk model editing page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3113

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Add @ to opengraph tag by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3049
  • Don't set SSL options if unavailable because of OpenSSL 1.x by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3098
  • Stop zero-length files showing as duplicates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3100
  • Fix IOerror on getting file size by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3103
  • Discard old jobs that were queued up for removed objects by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3102
  • Fix file deletion errors caused by presupported links by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3112
  • Add tag completion on upload form by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3114
  • Restore tag sorting by name in dropdowns by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3116

üåç Sustainability & Performance üåç

  • Remove unnecessary indexes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3050

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Ignore admin and healthcheck paths in performance dashboard by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3080
  • Gather memory statistics for rails_performance by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3091
  • Improvements to problem list core by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3099
  • Update setting text to reflect empty file check by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3104
  • Exclude documents from duplicate detection by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3115

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.86.0...v0.87.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.88.0
entry.content:
This release was just going to be bugfixes, but then we added support for a load of new file formats, particularly ones used for stuff like game development or higher-end graphics work. So, you can now index Collada (DAE), FBX, IGES, DXF, 3DS/MAX, Maya, Modo, Sketchup and even more. Take a look at the supported formats page on the website for the full list!

There's also an important bug fix for OIDC login, which should fix issues with the redirect URL being incorrect.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Index DXF files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3123
  • Many new formats (3DS, DAE, FBX, AMF, IGES and more!) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3124

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Prevent orphaned problems when merging models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3118
  • Don't require PUBLIC_PORT if PUBLIC_HOSTNAME is set, unless it's a non-default port by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3122

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Remove orphaned problems in "check all" job by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3117
  • Refactor and simplify old file removal code by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3121

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.87.0...v0.88.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.89.0
entry.content:
Mostly behind-the-scenes changes and bugfixes this time round; better 3MF conversion behaviour, custom database port support, and fixes for sites that aren't running at the root of their domain. There's also been a big reorganisation of the settings; user-specific settings are now in the same place as password and email, whereas the old settings page is now just for site-wide admin settings.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Set actor attribution domain by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3155
  • Add ability to specify custom DATABASE_PORT by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3157
  • Log problem if 3MF conversion fails because a mesh is non-manifold by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3181

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Use correct attribution domain from settings by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3156
  • Fix potential error with empty locale setting by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3160
  • Fix broken admin, problem and activity links when using RAILS_RELATIVE_URL_ROOT by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3161
  • Don't retry 3MF conversion for non-manifold meshes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3182
  • Use consistent resolution buttons in problem panels by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3183
  • Fix tooltip text on activity icons by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3184
  • Update 3MF conversion buttons when finished by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3185
  • Clear out stuck problems by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3187
  • Restore missing problem resolution button translations by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3189
  • Fix upload path when using RAILS_RELATIVE_URL_ROOT by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3190
  • Fix attachment data error on MySQL databases by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3191
  • Fix internal errors on follow requests by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3204

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Move mesh analysis into its own gem by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3147
  • Move 3MF export code into separate mittsu-3mf by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3153
  • Reorganise settings pages by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3166
  • Disable conversion button for non-manifold meshes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3186

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.88.0...v0.89.0
